price: 27. (Soeleiman) zei: “Wij zullen zien of jij de waarheid spreekt of dat jij (een) van de leugenaars bent.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
